name: World of Cars! Car games for boys! Smart kids app
name_original: World of Cars! Car games for boys! Smart kids app
description:
Children's games for 3 to 5 yrs old has been created by MAGE, specializing in development of preschool, educational games for children and toddler games for boys. We hope that your child will like our preschool and kindergarten learning games free and that it will help kids learn to read and a lot of new things about the surrounding world.

The games for kids 5 years free help preschoolers to develop memory, attention span, vocabulary and speech, as well as other basic skills. We made detailed realistic illustrations for games for toddlers 3 years ol. Kids learn to read through building puzzles for kids under 5 and learning simple rhymes for kids.

As a company we strive to make our apps practical, instilling a desire for knowledge, interest in reading and studying. Our apps contain no third party advertising and comply with the standards of “Designed For Family”.
